roleset.name: name

role.descr: larger body of text, within which a smaller selection is marked
smaller selection marked for easy revisiting

example.name: bookmark-v
example.text: The added date parameter can also cause problems with your Calendar if you have bookmarked it at a future date.

example.name: bookmark-v
example.text: A cup of coffee In hand he slips in his comfy chair geared up with reading glasses, and a book, bookmarked at page 30.

example.name: bookmark-v
example.text: He bookmarked it with a business card stolen from his Algebra teacher, Mister Bullock.
example.arg: with a business card stolen from his Algebra teacher, Mister Bullock.

example.name: bookmark-v
example.text: Move to letter -LRB- current position is bookmarked -RRB- by pressing # 7 or fast - forwarding .

example.name: bookmark-v
example.text: Also, you might want to keep this link bookmarked *, which is an archive of the bullshit the lefties have been throwing, along with links debunking said bullshit.

roleset.note: BOOKMARK-V, BOOKMARK-N NOTES: Added by Julia for THYME.
